content: StudyPal

Mobile app that helps online students manage their time and stay on track with their coursework by connecting them with study partners, creating study schedules, and setting reminders for important deadlines.
Study partner matching, study scheduling, deadline reminders, progress tracking, chat functionality
Focus@Will, myHomework, Forest, Trello, Asana
Study partner matching
SmartCourse

An AI-powered time management tool that analyzes students' schedules and coursework to create personalized study plans. The tool also syncs with students' calendars to optimize study time and reduce conflicts with other commitments.
AI-powered scheduling, calendar integration, progress tracking, performance analytics, deadline reminders
Google Calendar, Clockify, Trello, Todoist, RescueTime
AI-powered scheduling
WorkPlay

A productivity app that promotes a healthy work-life balance by helping students manage their time more effectively. WorkPlay uses a reward system that encourages students to take breaks and engage in leisure activities, reducing the risk of burnout.
Pomodoro timer, progress tracker, rewards system, activity suggestions, habit builder
Forest, Timeular, Focus@Will, Brain.fm, Freedom
Rewards system
AceMyTime

A virtual assistant service that assists students with their online coursework, freeing up time for other commitments. Virtual assistants can offer services such as research, note-taking, proofreading, and citation formatting.
Virtual assistant support, research assistance, note-taking, proofreading, citation formatting, task management
Fancy Hands, Task Rabbit, Upwork, Fiverr, Freelancer
Focus on education support
pain_point_description: online courses are meant to be flexible, but some students find it challenging to manage their time effectively. they struggle with balancing their studies, work, and personal life, which can lead to stress and burnout
